== Meenad (CT) (628450) ==

Meenad (CT) is a town in the [[Kollam]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 16.77 sq. km. and harbouring 7673 households with total population of 29716 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 60 km. Male population is 13785 and female population is 15931. Scheduled Caste population is 3601 and Scheduled Tribes population is 77. Census Location Code of the town is 628450<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 60 km. Railway station is at Paravoor at a distance of 10 km.
